trans-unit.source: Represents a binding between an <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputGesture"></xref> and a command.
trans-unit.target: Representa um vínculo entre um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputGesture"> </xref> e um comando.

trans-unit.source: The command is potentially a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O comando é, potencialmente, um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides base initialization for classes derived from <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a inicialização de base para classes derivam de <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> is not technically an abstract class, but the default constructor is deliberately protected access.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>Não é tecnicamente uma classe abstracta, mas o construtor predefinido é deliberadamente protegidos acesso.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: This has the effect of making <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> an "abstract" class for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Isto tem o efeito de efetuar <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>"abstrato" de classe para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: There are existing properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] that have [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usages that expect objects of type <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>, but you cannot specify an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> instance in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Existem propriedades existentes no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] que tenham [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] utilizações que esperam objetos do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>, mas não é possível especificar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>instância na [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can specify one of the device-specific <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> derived classes as values, for instance <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, pode especificar um o específicos do dispositivo <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>derivada classes como valores, para a instância <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> class with the specified command and input gesture.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"> </xref> classe com o comando especificado e gesto de entrada.

trans-unit.source: If you are a software developer using existing input binding classes, you generally will not use this constructor, even if you are defining custom commands.
trans-unit.target: Se for um programador de software utilizando a entrada existente enlace classes, geralmente, não utilizará este construtor, mesmo se está a definir comandos personalizados.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you will either use constructors of derived classes (<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>), or you will use this constructor as the base instantiation of a custom class.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, irá utilizar construtores de classes derivadas (<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>), ou que irá utilizar este construtor como a instanciação de base de uma classe personalizada.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> class supports different input devices in principle, in practice you must choose which device the input binding will represent.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>classe suporta dispositivos de entrada diferentes no princípio, na prática, tem de escolher qual era o dispositivo irá representar o enlace de entrada.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: You only can set only one <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Gesture%2A> value on the input binding, and gestures are device-specific.
trans-unit.target: Só pode definir apenas um <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Gesture%2A>valor no enlace de entrada e gestos são específicos do dispositivo.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Gesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The command to associate with `gesture`.
trans-unit.target: O comando para associar `gesture`.

trans-unit.source: The input gesture to associate with `command`.
trans-unit.target: O gesto de entrada para associar `command`.

trans-unit.source: command or gesture is .
trans-unit.target: commandor gesture is .

trans-unit.source: Copies the base (non-animated) values of the properties of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Copia os base (não animada) os valores das propriedades do objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a clonagem.

trans-unit.source: Copies the current values of the properties of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Copia os valores atuais das propriedades do objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a clonagem.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> associated with this input binding.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>associado a este enlace de entrada.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> class does not support [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage because it does not expose a public default constructor (it has a default constructor, but it is protected).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>classe não suporta [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] utilização porque não expõe um construtor público predefinido (tem um construtor predefinido, mas está protegido).</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: However, derived classes can expose a public constructor and therefore, can use properties that are inherited from <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, as classes derivadas podem expor um construtor público e por isso, podem utilizar propriedades são herdadas do <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: Two existing <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> derived classes that can be instantiated in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] and can set properties with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usages are <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Dois existente <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>derivada classes que podem ser instanciadas em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] e pode definir propriedades com [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] utilizações são <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> references a type converter that enables certain preexisting <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> implementations to specify values in the form of a string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>referencia um conversor de tipos que permite a determinados pré-existentes <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>implementações para especificar valores sob a forma de uma cadeia.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand></xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: This type conversion behavior sets the attribute value form of this property.
trans-unit.target: Este comportamento de conversão do tipo define o formato do valor de atributo desta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: You can also bind the Command, <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandParameter%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> properties to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> that is defined on an object.
trans-unit.target: Também é possível vincular o comando, <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandParameter%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A>Propriedades para um <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>que está definida num objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandParameter%2A>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to define a custom command and associate it with user input.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite-lhe definir os comandos personalizados e associá-la a intervenção do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the second example in <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o segundo exemplo na <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage <`inputBindingDerivedClass` `Command`=""/> ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `inputBindingDerivedClass` A derived class of that supports object element syntax, such as or .
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML `inputBindingDerivedClass` `Command`= "" / > # # utilização de elemento de propriedade XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores `inputBindingDerivedClass` uma classe derivada do que suporte a sintaxe do elemento de objeto, tais como ou .

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Consulte observações.

trans-unit.source: `iCommandImplementation` An object implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> that supports object element syntax (has a public default constructor).
trans-unit.target: `iCommandImplementation`Uma implementação de objeto de <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>que suporte a sintaxe do elemento de objeto (tem um construtor público predefinido).</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: The associated command.
trans-unit.target: O comando associado.

trans-unit.source: The Command value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor do comando é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command-specific data for a particular command.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os dados específicos de comando para um comando específico.

trans-unit.source: The CommandParameter property is used to pass specific information to the command when it is executed.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade CommandParameter é utilizada para transmitir informações específicas para o comando quando é executada.

trans-unit.source: The type of the data is defined by the command.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de dados é definido pelo comando.

trans-unit.source: Many commands do not expect command parameters; for these commands, any command parameters passed will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: Vários comandos espera parâmetros de comando para estes comandos, quaisquer parâmetros de comando transmitidos serão ignorados.

trans-unit.source: If the command that an input binding is associated with is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, the CommandParameter of the input binding is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> handlers through the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs> event data when the command is processed.
trans-unit.target: Se o comando que se encontra associado um enlace de entrada é um <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, CommandParameter do enlace de entrada é passado para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>processadores através de <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs>e o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs>dados de eventos quando o comando é processado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: The data type and purpose of the command parameter are defined differently for each command and can be `null`.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de dados e o objetivo do parâmetro do comando são definidos de forma diferente para cada comando e podem ser `null`.

trans-unit.source: You can bind the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Command%2A>, CommandParameter, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> properties to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> that is defined on an object.
trans-unit.target: É possível vincular o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Command%2A>, CommandParameter, e <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A>Propriedades para um <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>que está definida num objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Command%2A>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to define a custom command and associate it with user input.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite-lhe definir os comandos personalizados e associá-la a intervenção do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the second example in <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o segundo exemplo na <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> class does not support [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage because it does not expose a public default constructor (it has a default constructor, but it is protected).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>classe não suporta [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] utilização porque não expõe um construtor público predefinido (tem um construtor predefinido, mas está protegido).</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: However, derived classes can expose a public constructor and therefore, can set properties that are inherited from <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, as classes derivadas pode expor um construtor público e por isso, pode definir propriedades que são herdadas do <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>com [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] utilização.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: Two existing <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> derived classes that can be instantiated in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] and can set properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] are <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Dois existente <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>derivada classes que podem ser instanciadas em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] e pode definir propriedades na [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] são <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `inputBindingDerivedClass` A derived class of that supports object element syntax, such as or .
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML ``` ``` # # utilização de elemento de propriedade XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores `inputBindingDerivedClass` uma classe derivada do que suporte a sintaxe do elemento de objeto, tais como ou .

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Consulte observações.

trans-unit.source: `commandParameterString` A string that is processed by a particular command.
trans-unit.target: `commandParameterString`Uma cadeia que é processada por um comando específico.

trans-unit.source: Strings are the common type used for command parameters because they can be easily set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: As cadeias são o tipo comum de utilizar para parâmetros de comando porque podem ser facilmente definidas [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: For the expected string format and its purpose, see the documentation for the particular command that the input binding is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Para o formato era esperada uma cadeia e o respetivo objetivo, consulte a documentação para o comando específica que o enlace de entrada é associado.

trans-unit.source: Many commands do not expect parameters.
trans-unit.target: Vários comandos não esperam parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: `commandParameterObject` An object that is processed by a particular command.
trans-unit.target: `commandParameterObject`Um objeto que é processado por um comando específico.

trans-unit.source: All existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] commands use strings.
trans-unit.target: Todos os existente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] comandos utilizam cadeias.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this property element syntax is only relevant for custom command scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, esta sintaxe do elemento de propriedade só é relevante para cenários de comando personalizados.

trans-unit.source: In order to support this syntax, the `commandParameterObject` object must also support object element syntax (must have a public default constructor).
trans-unit.target: Para suportar esta sintaxe, o `commandParameterObject` objeto também tem de suportar sintaxe do elemento de objeto (tem de ter um construtor público predefinido).

trans-unit.source: The command-specific data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados específicos de comando.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandParameter*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandParameter*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandParameter*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Command*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Command*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Command*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target element of the command.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o elemento de destino do comando.

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] commanding system, the CommandTarget property on an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> object is applicable only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: No [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] commanding sistema, a propriedade CommandTarget num <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>objeto é aplicável apenas quando <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>é <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>

trans-unit.source: If the CommandTarget is set on an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> and the corresponding command is not a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, the command target is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se o CommandTarget está definido num <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>e o comando correspondente não é um <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, o destino de comando é ignorado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>

trans-unit.source: When used with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, the command target is the object on which the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> events are raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando utilizado com um <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, o comando de destino é o objeto no qual o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute>eventos são gerados.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: If the CommandTarget property is not set, the element with keyboard focus is used as the target.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade CommandTarget não estiver definida, o elemento com o foco do teclado é utilizado como destino.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> class itself does not support [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage, because it does not expose a public default constructor (there is a default constructor, but it is protected).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>não suporta a própria classe [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] utilização, porque não expõe um construtor público predefinido (existe um construtor predefinido, mas está protegido).</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: However, derived classes can expose a public constructor and therefore can set properties that are inherited from <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> with a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, as classes derivadas pode expor um construtor público e, por conseguinte, pode definir propriedades que são herdadas do <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>com um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] utilização.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: Two existing <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> derived classes that can be instantiated in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] and can set properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] are <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Dois existente <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>derivada classes que podem ser instanciadas em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] e pode definir propriedades na [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] são <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `inputBindingDerivedClass` A derived class of that supports object element syntax, such as or .
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores `inputBindingDerivedClass` uma classe derivada do que suporte a sintaxe do elemento de objeto, tais como ou .

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Consulte observações.

trans-unit.source: `bindingToTarget` A string that uses a type of binding syntax that can return an object reference to an existing named element.
trans-unit.target: `bindingToTarget`Uma cadeia que utiliza um tipo de sintaxe de enlace que pode devolver uma referência de objeto a um existente com o nome de elemento.

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Consulte observações.

trans-unit.source: The target of the command.
trans-unit.target: O destino do comando.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of an <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new object.
trans-unit.target: O novo objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputGesture"></xref> associated with this input binding.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputGesture"> </xref> associado a este enlace de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The associated gesture.
trans-unit.target: O gesto associado.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Makes the instance a frozen clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> by using base (non-animated) property values.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que a instância de um clone congelado de especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref> utilizando valores de propriedade base (não animada).

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a clonagem.

trans-unit.source: Makes the current instance a frozen clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que a instância atual um clone congelado de especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the object has animated dependency properties, their current animated values are copied.
trans-unit.target: Se o objeto tem propriedades de dependência animado, os respetivos valores animados atuais são copiados.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a clonagem.
